summary.Title: BI Developer
summary.Presentation: Do you have a passion for building a BI platform, an eye for details, and are you motivated by making a difference? If so, you may just be our new BI Developer in our

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have a passion for building a BI platform, an eye for details, and are you motivated by making a difference? If so, you may just be our new BI Developer in our Analytics & Insights Team!  

“You now have the opportunity to join us and become part of a truly dynamic and international company.” says Michael Søndberg Madsen, Information Manager.


This is Stibo 
Stibo A/S was founded in 1794 as a printing company to serve the Royal House of Denmark and is still privately held and owned by the Stibo Foundation, whose charter is ensuring the long-term development and survival of the company and contributing to the community. 

To learn more about the Stibo Group please go to www.stibo.com. 


The Stibo Group serves as a central organization interacting with and supporting the subsidiaries in areas like IT, HR, legal, risk management, IT and information security and general compliance tasks. 

Stibo Group has 3 subsidiaries with 25+ locations worldwide: 

  • Stibo Systems – a globally leading provider of master data management (MDM) and product information management (PIM) solutions 

  • Stibo DX – a globally leading provider of content management systems (CMS) and digital asset management (DAM) solutions 

  • Stibo Complete – a leading printing company in Scandinavia 
     

This is your team
You will become a member of our Analytics & Insights Team, which is currently 6 members – but it will grow over the next months. You will be sitting in our Aarhus office, and work with the rest of the team to build the platform that we need to be able to deliver Analytics & Insights to the rest of the Stibo Group. 

As our BI Developer 
You will be the backbone of implementing our new group-wide Data Warehouse and preparing the data in it for reporting and analytics. 

You will play a great role in building and maturing our BI platform and will be implementing the ETL and integrations needed to make it all work.

You will be expected to work primarily with the technical side of our platform – using MS SQL, Integrations Services (SSIS), C# and similar technologies. 

You will have a close relationship with the team, but will also be part of a global organization, which you will need to interact with from time to time. 


More specifically, you will: 

  • Be our platform go-to person 

  • Design and implement ETL  

  • Design and implement automation

  • Create integrations between our systems 
     

Who are we looking for 
A team player that wants to take part in building a platform fit for the Stibo Group to use and benefit from. We expect that you will put your technical background into play and contribute to the overall solution with dedication and eagerness to learn. We expect that you can navigate comfortably within SQL, SSIS and SSAS. If you have an interest in the Power Platform, it would be great – but not a requirement. 

Moreover, you have: 

  • A relevant education, e.g. business intelligence or computer science

  • Analytical skills

  • Attention to detail

  • 2 years+ of experience with the MS BI Tools

  • Knowledge of Power BI & DAX 

  • English and Danish language skills, both written and oral 
     

Interested?
We invite candidates for interviews on a continuous basis, so please apply as soon as possible. 

Should you have questions about the position, you are welcome to contact Michael Søndberg-Madsen, Information Manager, on +45 51228384.
